column1: # Dotfiles Shortcuts Index
# Format: category│shortcut│description│full_command
# This file is used by bin/cheatsheet for the interactive search
# To add a new shortcut:
# 1. Add the alias/function to the appropriate file in shell/aliases/
# 2. Add an entry here following the format above
# 3. Keep entries grouped by category and alphabetically sorted within category
# Git shortcuts
git│gs│Show working tree status and staged changes│git status
git│gl│Show commit history as decorated graph│git log --oneline --decorate --graph
git│ga│Stage specific files for commit│git add
git│gaa│Stage all changes in working directory│git add .
git│gau│Stage all tracked files that have changes│git add -u
git│gd│Show unstaged changes in working directory│git diff
git│gds│Show staged changes ready to commit│git diff --staged
git│gc│Create commit with editor for message│git commit
git│gcm│Create commit with inline message│git commit -m
git│gsw│Switch to existing branch│git switch
git│gswc│Create and switch to new branch│git switch -c
git│gb│List all local branches│git branch
git│gf│Download objects and refs from remote│git fetch
git│gfo│Download latest changes from origin remote│git fetch origin
git│gfu│Download latest changes from upstream remote│git fetch upstream
git│gfa│Download changes from all configured remotes│git fetch --all
git│gp│Upload local commits to remote│git push
git│gpl│Download and merge remote changes│git pull
git│gst│Save working changes to temporary area│git stash
git│gstp│Apply and remove most recent stash│git stash pop
git│lg│Launch interactive terminal UI for git│lazygit
git│gundo│Undo last commit but keep changes staged│git reset HEAD~1 --soft
# Tmux shortcuts
tmux│Ctrl+a |│Split current pane horizontally (top/bottom)│prefix + |
tmux│Ctrl+a -│Split current pane vertically (left/right)│prefix + -
tmux│Ctrl+a x│Close current pane│prefix + x
tmux│Ctrl+a X│Close current window and all panes│prefix + X
tmux│Ctrl+a c│Create new window│prefix + c
tmux│Ctrl+a 1-9│Switch to window by number (1-9)│prefix + number
tmux│Ctrl+a n│Switch to next window│prefix + n
tmux│Ctrl+a p│Switch to previous window│prefix + p
tmux│Ctrl+a d│Detach from current session│prefix + d
tmux│Ctrl+a s│Show session list for switching│prefix + s
tmux│Ctrl+a $│Rename current session│prefix + $
tmux│Ctrl+a (│Switch to previous session│prefix + (
tmux│Ctrl+a )│Switch to next session│prefix + )
tmux│Ctrl+a r│Reload tmux configuration file│prefix + r
tmux│Ctrl+a ?│Display all tmux keybindings│prefix + ?
tmux│Alt+E│Move focus to pane above (no prefix)│Alt+E (no prefix needed)
tmux│Alt+S│Move focus to pane on left (no prefix)│Alt+S (no prefix needed)
tmux│Alt+D│Move focus to pane below (no prefix)│Alt+D (no prefix needed)
tmux│Alt+F│Move focus to pane on right (no prefix)│Alt+F (no prefix needed)
tmux│Alt+1-9│Switch to window by number (no prefix)│Alt+number (no prefix needed)
tmux│Ctrl+a E│Resize pane upward by 5 lines│prefix + E (5 lines)
tmux│Ctrl+a S│Resize pane leftward by 5 lines│prefix + S (5 lines)
tmux│Ctrl+a D│Resize pane downward by 5 lines│prefix + D (5 lines)
tmux│Ctrl+a F│Resize pane rightward by 5 lines│prefix + F (5 lines)
# Vim shortcuts
vim│Ctrl+P│Fuzzy search and open files│Ctrl+P
vim│,f│Open file browser sidebar│leader + f
vim│,b│Show list of open buffers│leader + b
vim│,g│Search text across project│leader + g
vim│Space│Clear search highlighting│Space
vim│jk│Exit insert mode and return to normal mode│jk
vim│,gs│Show git status in split│leader + gs
vim│,gd│Show git diff in split│leader + gd
vim│,gb│Show git blame for current line│leader + gb
vim│,hn│Jump to next git change (hunk)│leader + hn
vim│,hs│Stage git hunk under cursor│leader + hs
vim│,hu│Undo git hunk under cursor│leader + hu
vim│,af│Auto-fix linting issues in file│leader + af
vim│,an│Jump to next linting error│leader + an
vim│,ap│Jump to previous linting error│leader + ap
vim│,/│Toggle comment on current line/selection│leader + /
vim│,n│Toggle relative line numbers│leader + n
vim│,ss│Remove trailing whitespace from file│leader + ss
vim│Ctrl+E│Move to split window above│Ctrl+E
vim│Ctrl+S│Move to split window on left│Ctrl+S
vim│Ctrl+D│Move to split window below│Ctrl+D
vim│Ctrl+F│Move to split window on right│Ctrl+F
vim│cs"'│Change surrounding " to '│cs"' (change " to ')
vim│ds"│Delete surrounding quotes│ds"
vim│ysiw"│Add quotes around current word│ysiw"
vim│gc│Comment out motion/selection│gc + motion
vim│,w│Save file (force write)│leader + w
vim│,Q│Quit all windows and buffers│leader + Q
vim│:w│Save current file│:w
vim│:q│Quit current window│:q
vim│,q│Quit current window│leader + q
vim│u│Undo last change│u
vim│.│Repeat last edit command│.
# Shell shortcuts
shell│..│Change to parent directory│cd ..
shell│...│Go up two directory levels│cd ../..
shell│-│Return to previous directory│cd -
shell│ls│List directory with colors (standard)│ls --color=auto
shell│ll│Long listing with eza enhancements│eza -l --color=auto --group-directories-first
shell│la│List all files including hidden (eza)│eza -la --color=auto --group-directories-first
shell│l│Compact column listing (eza)│eza -CF --color=auto --group-directories-first
shell│tree│Display directory tree structure│eza --tree --color=auto
shell│bat│View file with syntax highlighting│batcat
shell│view│View file with syntax highlighting│batcat
shell│df│Show disk space usage (human readable)│df -h
shell│du│Show directory size (human readable)│du -h
shell│free│Show memory usage (human readable)│free -h
shell│ports│List all open network ports│netstat -tulanp
shell│myip│Show your public IP address│curl ifconfig.me
shell│localip│Show your local network IP│hostname -I
shell│tm│Create new named tmux session│tmux new -s
shell│ta│Attach to existing tmux session│tmux attach -t
shell│tl│List all tmux sessions│tmux list-sessions
shell│tk│Kill specific tmux session│tmux kill-session -t
shell│h│Show command history│history
shell│hgrep│Search command history│history | grep
shell│ducks│Show largest directories and files in current dir│du -cks * | sort -rn | head
shell│reload│Reload shell configuration│source ~/.zshrc or ~/.bashrc
shell│themes│List available color themes│ls configs/themes/
shell│theme-switch│Launch interactive theme selector│$DOTFILES_DIR/bin/theme-switcher
shell│update-configs│Update dotfiles configurations│$DOTFILES_DIR/bin/update-configs
shell│fr│Find and replace text across files│$DOTFILES_DIR/bin/fr
shell│cheat│Show this interactive cheatsheet│$DOTFILES_DIR/bin/cheatsheet
shell│cl│Start new Claude AI session│claude
shell│clc│Continue previous Claude session│claude --continue
shell│clp│Run one-off Claude command│claude --print
shell│fgb│Fuzzy search and switch git branches│FZF git branch selector
shell│fgl│Fuzzy search git commit history│FZF git log browser
shell│frg│Fuzzy search file contents with ripgrep│FZF + ripgrep content search
shell│fp│Fuzzy search and open project directories│FZF project directory finder
# Docker shortcuts
docker│dps│List currently running containers│docker ps
docker│dpsa│List all containers (running and stopped)│docker ps -a
docker│dexec│Execute command in running container│docker exec -it
docker│dlogs│Stream container logs in real-time│docker logs -f
docker│dstop│Stop running container│docker stop
docker│drm│Remove stopped container│docker rm
docker│di│List all Docker images│docker images
docker│dpull│Download image from registry│docker pull
docker│dbuild│Build image from Dockerfile with tag│docker build -t
docker│dc│Run Docker Compose command│docker compose
docker│dcu│Start all services in background│docker compose up -d
docker│dcd│Stop and remove all containers│docker compose down
docker│dcl│Stream logs from all services│docker compose logs -f
docker│dprune│Remove unused containers and images│docker system prune
docker│dprunea│Remove all unused Docker resources│docker system prune -a
docker│denter│Open interactive bash shell in container│docker exec -it <container> /bin/bash
docker│dstopall│Stop all running containers at once│docker stop $(docker ps -q)
# Python shortcuts (pyenv + Poetry/pip workflow)
python│pyset│Set Python version for project (Poetry or pip)│pyset <version> (e.g., pyset 3.11.9)
python│vactivate│Activate virtual environment (smart detection)│vactivate
python│pyinfo│Show current Python environment information│pyinfo
python│pylist│List installed and available Python versions│pylist
python│pactivate│Activate Poetry project venv│pactivate (Poetry-only alternative to vactivate)
python│pyenv install│Install new Python version│pyenv install <version>
python│pyenv versions│List installed Python versions│pyenv versions
python│pyenv local│Set Python version for current directory│pyenv local <version>
python│pyenv global│Set default Python version system-wide│pyenv global <version>
python│poetry install│Install Poetry project dependencies│poetry install
python│poetry add│Add package to Poetry project│poetry add <package>
python│poetry env info│Show Poetry environment details│poetry env info
python│pip install -e│Install package in editable mode (setuptools)│pip install -e .
python│py│Run Python 3 interpreter│python3
python│pytest│Run test suite with pytest│python -m pytest
python│pyt│Run pytest with verbose output│python -m pytest -v
# Node.js shortcuts
node│ni│Install dependencies from package.json│npm install
node│nr│Run npm script from package.json│npm run
node│nrd│Run development script│npm run dev
node│nrb│Run build script│npm run build
node│nrt│Run test script│npm run test
node│nrs│Run start script│npm run start
# VS Code shortcuts
vscode│c│Open VS Code in current directory│code .
vscode│cdot│Open dotfiles directory in VS Code│code $DOTFILES_DIR
vscode│cproj│Fuzzy search and open project in VS Code│FZF project finder + open in VSCode
vscode│cf│Fuzzy search and open file in VS Code│FZF file finder + open in VSCode
vscode│cdiff│Compare two files side-by-side│code --diff file1 file2
# WSL shortcuts
wsl│cdwin│Navigate to Windows home directory│cd $WIN_HOME
wsl│cddesk│Navigate to Windows desktop│cd $WIN_DESKTOP
wsl│cddl│Navigate to Windows downloads folder│cd $WIN_DOWNLOADS
wsl│cddocs│Navigate to Windows documents folder│cd $WIN_DOCUMENTS
wsl│notepad│Open Windows Notepad│notepad.exe
wsl│clip│Access Windows clipboard│clip.exe
wsl│pwsh│Launch PowerShell│powershell.exe
wsl│cmd│Launch Windows Command Prompt│cmd.exe
wsl│explorer│Open Windows File Explorer│explorer.exe
wsl│open│Open Windows File Explorer (alias)│explorer.exe
wsl│cwd│Copy current directory path to clipboard│pwd | clip.exe
wsl│wcd│Copy Windows path to clipboard│wslpath -w $(pwd) | clip.exe
wsl│wpath│Convert Linux path to Windows format│wslpath -w
wsl│lpath│Convert Windows path to Linux format│wslpath -u
wsl│sync-ssh│Import SSH keys from Windows│import_windows_ssh_keys
